name: 诺曼·格雷戈里·麦圭尔
name_full: 诺曼·格雷戈里·麦圭尔 Norman Gregory McGuire
birth_place: 美国,路易斯安那州,什里夫波特
introduction: Award Winning Director Norman McGuire is an Indy Filmmaker born in Louisiana, but moved to the state of Texas early in his 20's. He fell in love with Cinema at an early age becoming a binge movie watcher. His 1st work was an extra on Walker Texas Ranger which set the stage for his directing career. McGuire also writes all of his works, but admits he hates the thought of a blank paper and pen...McGuire has won twice at IndieFEST for his films "The Lucky Man" and "From Eva, with Love". He spends his time between Dallas and Los Angeles working in the industry. In his own words he hopes to catalog 12 feature presentations over his career.McGuire is the owner of the following companies:Lucky Films, LLC - Lucky Films is a Delaware Corporation that develops and produces Independent Films. The company is responsible for the production of "The Lucky Man", starring Jesse James & "21 Years - Richard Linklater", starring Billy Bob Thornton, Jack Black, Ethan Hawke, and Matthew McConaughey.McGuire Solutions, Inc - Texas based McGuire Solutions is a Network Engineering & Architecture firm that works specifically with Healthcare, Oil & Gas, Finance & Insurance, Government, Military, and Education entities across the United States.Bee Cave Systems, LLC - Bee Cave Systems is a software development company that focuses on web/cloud based solutions within the Healthcare, Oil & Gas, and Government sectors.In 2010, McGuire sold his 1st company, McGuire Systems, Inc. to a larger competitor.
